entries.arrived_at_loc: The Imperial Informant was a spy! He led the Imperial Inqusition right to the base! Defend the base for approximately seven minutes, that should give them enough time to prepare their defenses!
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.first_attack: Alert! Alert! Enemy vessels closing in!
entries.found_loc: Suspicious activity in the area, sir. Proceed with caution
entries.outofrange: Brother Ezkiel: < What are you doing pilot! Get back in there and fight! >
entries.outofrange_failed: Mission failed! Too far away from objective point. Return to Ezkiel.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: Guard this area with everything you have, don't let the Imperial fighters break through until the base defense is prepared.
entries.quest_location_d: This area of the Dantooine system is fairly secure but the Imperial Inquisition is moving a massive fleet our way.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: This is the coordinates of the area you are assigned to protect my friend.
entries.split_quest_alert: Brother Ezkiel: < The Imperial spy that you escorted earlier is trying to escape. Disable his ship and transfer over any information he may have in his onboard computer! >
entries.title: Dantooine system: The Inquisition attacks!
entries.title_d: The Imperial officer scum was a spy sent to confirm the presence of our organisation on this base. The Inquisition is sending a massive attack our way. The base took heavy damage in the earlier attack and needs a few minutes to prepare the defenses. Try to hold off the Imperial forces at your assigned location.
entries.trans_update: Vortex Command: < Stay alert, pilot. The Space station defenses are %DI percent operational. >
entries.transmission_received: Vortex Command: < Great work, pilot! Thanks to yours and other pilots outstanding work, the space station defences are operational and should be able to easily fend off the attack. >
entries.transmission_start: Vortex Command: < Be on the alert, pilot! Our sensors detect enemy activity. >
